footnotes: Na walio uwawa katika njia ya Mwenyezi Mungu kabisa hatoacha vitendo vyao vipotee. Atawahidi, na azitengeneze nyoyo zao, na awatie katika Pepo aliyo kwisha wajuulisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
